channel.title: How to put skill requirements in U-Rune
channel.description: I've added theifing, i just need to put requirements on stalls, can someone explain.

item.title: How to put skill requirements in U-Rune
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

} if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 700k", $, 750*playerLevel[17], 995, 70000, 0x340); }

First of all, your code should look at little like the one above. You see where the $ sign is? Well that’s where your theiving level requirement is. Say you wanted a 99 stall? Then simply change the $ to 99 like the code below.

} if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 700k", 99, 750*playerLevel[17], 995, 70000, 0x340); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to put skill requirements in U-Rune

item.title: How to put skill requirements in U-Rune
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Johndabest:

why does no one ever reply on these forums and whenever they do its a snobby remark saying that its in the wrong section … i can never find help anywhere.

Stay ontopic. And if you post in the wrong section, you do not get a “snobby” remark, you get a remark stating that it IS in the wrong section. It’s in the rules, which NOBODY reads anymore, that you should only post here if it’s SERVER. HELP. RELATED. Meaning coding problems, not compiler, not run.bat, not some other bullshit thing people will flame rule-abiding people for.

–This IS a coding problem.

@Topic: Search a stall or some item that has a requirement in client.java.
Look for what gives it the requirement, and just do it for your stalls.

Read full topic
item.source: How to put skill requirements in U-Rune
